name: Slime-azon
description:
Welcome to Slime-azon newbie!

As the newest slime to the force of Slime-azon delivery services, it’s up to you to deliver the mail to every resident in your designated area!

We’ll start you off with an easier course for training, and ramp it up after each successful delivery run.

Watch out for debris on the path. Being a slime, your body is very unstable. Even a gentle tap on such things will have you splitting pieces of yourself away until there’s nothing left.

Dodge obstacles, and deliver the mail! We here at Slime-azon HQ are behind you all the way.

The Team
Axcel | 3D Artist, Texture Artist
Lili | Project Manager, Technical Artist
Matt G. | Programmer
Zachary N. | Concept and 2D Artist
